mapper.select: SELECT TA.DANJ_NO, -- 单据编号 TA.DANJ_SORT, -- 单据行号 TA.SHANGP_ID, -- 商品ID TB.item_code, -- 商品编号 TB.item_name, -- 中文名 TB.manufacturer, -- 生产厂家 '*' YAOP_GUIG, -- 药品规格 (select bpi.package_unit from bas_item bi left join bas_package bp on bi.item_id = bp.item_id left join bas_package_items bpi on bpi.package_id = bp.package_id where bpi.package_level = '3' and bi.item_id = TA.SHANGP_ID) BAOZ_DANW, -- 包装单位 TB.approval_no, -- 批准文号 TB.remark, -- 备注 TA.LOT, -- 批号 -- TE.YOUX_DATE, -- 是否优先出库 TE.lot02, -- 生产日期 TE.lot03, -- 有效期至 TE.lot01, -- 批号 TA.DANW_ID, -- 单位编号 TC.customer_code, -- 单位编号 TC.customer_name, -- 单位名称 TA.RUK_NUM, -- 入库数量 TA.BUHGP_NUM, -- 不合格品数量 TA.ZHILQK_REFLECTION, -- 质量情况反馈 TA.SUOZBM_OPINION, -- 所在部门意见 TA.ZHILGLBM_AFFIRMATION, -- 质量管理部门意见 TA.SHENH_FLG, -- 是否审核 TA.ZHUANCTZ_FLG, -- 是否转成台账 TA.YUAN_NO, -- 原单据编号 TA.HANGHAO_OLD, -- 原行号 TA.YEZ_ID, -- 货主ID TD.owner_name, -- 货主名称 TF.RIQI_DATE, TF.CAOZ_STAFF, TF.ZHIJ_STAFF, TF.ZHIJ_STAFF_ID, TF.CAOZ_STAFF_ID, 'NHK' TO_KUB, (SELECT T.loc_id FROM bas_location /*JC_HWZD*/ T WHERE T.loc_classify='4' AND T.is_lock='0' AND T.owner_id=TA.YEZ_ID AND ROWNUM=1) TO_HUOW_ID FROM GSP_BHGYPQRB_MX TA,GSP_BHGYPQRB_HZ TF, bas_item TB, bas_customer /*JC_DWZL*/ TC, bas_owner /*JC_HZZL*/ TD, bas_lot_att /*JC_PHWHB*/ TE WHERE TA.SHANGP_ID = TB.item_id AND TA.DANW_ID = TC.customer_id AND TA.YEZ_ID = TD.owner_id AND TA.LOT = TE.lot_id AND TA.SHANGP_ID = TE.item_id AND TA.DANJ_NO = TF.DANJ_NO --@ and TA.DANJ_NO = #{DANJ_NO}
mapper.update: update GSP_BHGYPQRB_HZ set YANS_ZZ = #{YANS_ZZ} where DANJ_NO = #{DANJ_NO}
update GSP_BHGYPQRB_MX set SUOZBM_OPINION=#{SUOZBM_OPINION} where DANJ_NO=#{DANJ_NO} and DANJ_SORT = #{DANJ_SORT}
mapper.select: SELECT DANJ_NO, TO_CHAR(RIQI_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') RIQI_DATE, CAOZ_STAFF, ZHIJ_STAFF, YANS_ZZ FROM (SELECT T_HZ.DANJ_NO, T_HZ.RIQI_DATE, /*-- 日期*/ T_HZ.CAOZ_STAFF CAOZ_STAFF, /*-- 操作员*/ T_HZ.ZHIJ_STAFF ZHIJ_STAFF, /*-- 质检员*/ T_HZ.YANS_ZZ YANS_ZZ /*-- 验收组长*/ FROM GSP_BHGYPQRB_HZ T_HZ WHERE T_HZ.YANS_ZZ IS NULL AND #{V_TYPE}='YSZSH' AND T_HZ.HOUSE_ID = #{HOUSE_ID} UNION SELECT T_HZ.DANJ_NO, T_HZ.RIQI_DATE, T_HZ.CAOZ_STAFF CAOZ_STAFF, T_HZ.ZHIJ_STAFF ZHIJ_STAFF, T_HZ.YANS_ZZ YANS_ZZ /*-- 验收组长*/ FROM GSP_BHGYPQRB_HZ T_HZ WHERE T_HZ.YANS_ZZ IS NOT NULL AND T_HZ.ZHIG_BZ IS NULL AND #{V_TYPE}='ZGBSH' AND T_HZ.HOUSE_ID = #{HOUSE_ID} )
